Name: Ability Doubler
Description: Doubles the effect of other gear abilities attached to this gear.

Name: Bomb Defense Up
Description: Reduces damage taken by blasts from sub weapons or special weapons.

Name: Cold-Blooded
Description: Shortens the duration of position trackers.

Name: Comeback
Description: Boosts some of your abilities for a short time after respawning.

Name: Drop Roller
Description: Tilting the L Stick during a Super Jump allows you to perform a forward or sideways roll when you land.

Name: Haunt
Description: Once you've respawned, reveals the position of the player who splatted you.

Name: Ink Recovery Up
Description: Increases Ink Tank refill rate while in squid form.

Name: Ink Resistance Up
Description: Decreases damage, speed, and jump penalties when standing in enemy Ink.

Name: Ink Saver (Main)
Description: Decreases Main Weapon Ink usage.

Name: Ink Saver (Sub)
Description: Decreases Sub Weapon Ink usage.

Name: Last-Ditch Effort
Description: Boosts ink recovert rate and weapon ink efficiency for the last 30 seconds of battle.

Name: Ninja Squid
Description: Leaves no trace when swimming in inked ground, but slightly reduces swim speed.

Name: Object Shredder
Description: Increases damage dealt to all non-player targets.

Name: Opening Gambit
Description: Boosts your speed in both inkling and squid form for the first 30 seconds of battle.

Name: Quick Respawn
Description: Reduces respawn time after getting splatted wthout splatting any opponents.

Name: Quick Super Jump
Description: Increases Super Jump speed.

Name: Respawn Punisher
Description: Increases respawn time and special-gauge spawn penalty for you and any player who splats you.

Name: Run Speed Up
Description: Increases movement speed in humanoid form.

Name: Special Charge Up
Description: Increases the rate at which the Special Gauge fills.

Name: Special Power Up
Description: Improves effectiveness of Special Weapon.

Name: Special Saver
Description: Decreases Special Gauge loss after being splatted.

Name: Stealth Jump
Description: Hides you Super Jump landing point from distant players.

Name: Sub Power Up
Description: Increases performance of Sub Weapons.

Name: Swim Speed Up
Description: Increases movement speed while swimming in squid form.

Name: Tenacity
Description: Fills special gauge automatically if your team has fewer active players that the enemy team.

Name: Thermal Ink
Description: Allows you to track distant players hit with shots from your main weapon.
